author: FARA-Assistant
name: AllianceScraper
short: Scrape alliance roster, logs, trainings, and funds with robust ID capture
description: Scrapes alliance data using CookieManager session. Resolves member IDs via /users/<id> or /profile/<id> and backfills missing IDs by visiting profiles. Includes DB migrations.
end_user_data_statement: Stores scraped alliance metadata locally (SQLite) for your server only.
